name: Starpier
description:
Starpier is not a finished project and it will not get updates in the future, but we wanted to share it still with you all in it's latest form A1.2. It's good to tell probably that the game doesn't contain any kind of loading screens. and was tested only on private before this, so no your game hasn't crashed. It's just downloading the world. Physics also break if you have a bad computer, but give it a try!

Starpier Classic was our first big project after a long time that we were seriously planning to release. We worked on it for ~7 months until Starpier Classic needed to be cancelled due to budget and planning problems at that time. 

Starpier was procedurally generated galaxy where you could do whatever you wanted. Story was also planned for it which would have told about the mysterious matter Negatium which were able to create wormholes and had negative gravity properties. 

If you have any questions or anything, we are still here to answer to them.

Controls

Mouse: Camera 

WASD: Movement 

Space: Jump 

M: Starmap 

Esc: Pause menu 

Shift: Fast speed 

C: Ship freecamera 

F: Interact 

Tab: PDA 

V: Camera mode 

G: Landing 

Left Mouse: Break 

Space: Hyperspeed

Hopefully you can atleast have some great time with it!
